venue.name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Boston North Shore

item.description:
Unity Games is coming to the North Shore!  Specifically, to Danvers.

Unity Games will be held on Saturday, January 26, 2013 for a whole day of gaming.  Cost is $12.50 prepay up until January 21 (go to event website to prepay) or $20 at the door. Watch this space for more details or check out http://www.unitygames.org.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: [other] Unity Games 19
